General.Name: City Office REIT Inc
General.Description: City Office REIT is an internally-managed real estate company focused on acquiring, owning and operating high-quality office properties located predominantly in Sun Belt markets. City Office currently owns or has a controlling interest in 6.0 million square feet of office properties. The Company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust for U.S. federal income tax purposes.
General.Address: 500 North Akard Street, Dallas, TX, United States, 75201
